about_the_game:
The game takes place in the "Republic of Krasnoslavia" - one of the dimensions in the Polyhedron multiverse and formerly its main hit. It used to be a true paradise for rebels, where people who connected to Krasnoslavia can smash the streets, steal cars, and feel boundless freedom. Nowadays, Krasnoslavia looks quite bleak. It's up to you to fix it, using guns and superpowers that allow you to hack the Polyhedron.



FEATURES

  • Lots of unique abilities that make the gameplay even more fun and varied
  • Forget about an abundance of identical guns, each weapon in the game is unique and created for different situations
  • Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of the Eastern European cyberpunk with acid cucumbers and hyper vodka
  • A variety of locations and game scenarios - first you are shooting soldiers from 3 guns at the same time, and then the floor turns into lava and a huge duck burns you with a laser from its eyes
  • A personal curator who will help you, cheer you up and blow your mind with his stories, you won't get rid of him so easily

name: Polyhedron: Tales from Krasnoslavia

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 4-core CPU @ 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 780/970/1050 or AMD Radeon 7950/280/470 (3 GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 8-core CPU @ 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 1080/2060 or AMD Radeon Vega64/5700 (8 GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Polyhedron: tales from Krasnoslavia - is a dynamic first-person shooter in the Eastern European cyberpunk setting. You can expect cool firearms, numerous unique abilities, diverse gameplay, and much more
supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
